actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster evaluation expenses.

summary.text: Provides an individual tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for disaster evacuation expenses required by a natural disaster or threat of natural disaster. Limits such credit to $200 to each such disaster requiring evacuation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster evaluation expenses.
